resources.string:
I love music. 
I like singing in the shower and dancing when I\â€™m alone in my home. 

I have a very pretty puppy, his name is Torito. 
I like to play with him but sometimes he gets me crazy. 

Also, I have 2 adorable nephews, 3 and 10 years old respectively. 
When I have free time, I go at their house and I spend time with them or we go out to some square to play the ball. 

I don't want to forget to mention what important is my family for me, they are my pillar. 
Without them I would be the same, they taught me to work hard to achieve my goals. And it's what I'm doing.
